items.name: Trigger
results: Lying to you about their identity
Lying to you about their intent.

items.name: Special Polearm
results: +[[/roll d10 #damage]] vs targets with a shield
+[[/roll d10 #damage]] vs targets without a shield

items.name: Where did the armour show itself?
Positive Effect
results: Speak remotely with any one person

items.name: Ability
results: Knights who strike the first blow against you lose [[/roll d6]] SPI

items.name: Limitation
results: Horses other than your own are afraid of you
Lose [[/roll d6]] SPI if you ever strike the first blow to a Knight

items.name: But
results: Always knows which way is north

items.name: Who Scarred You?
results: Ruler of the Seat of Power

items.name: Your Betrayal
results: Neglect in a time of great need

items.name: Ability
results: Can be recalled to your hand when in sight

items.name: Start
results: Twin Knights are lost in the woods
The Lion and the Lizard are bitter rivals
A mother hates her six ugly sons
A hermit lambasts the stars for his sad life
A clever chicken outwits a farmer
A poet wastes her life fleeing from death

items.name: End
results: They’re eaten by a pack of wolves
They all die of a disgusting plague
It turns into a call to find the City
It ends on a literal cliffhanger
They all lived happily ever after

items.name: A Strange Steed
results: Other steeds show fealty to it

items.name: Twist
results: Can also be used in melee combat

items.name: Special Ability
results: Allows you to fall safely from any height

items.name: Why?
results: It happened before you bought them

items.name: Use
results: Instantly cools any liquid it touches
It transforms into 20ft of rope when shaken
Seers believe it is a blessing upon you

items.name: But…
results: It’s long and inconvenient to carry
It looks just like every other stick
It only works in bright sunlight

items.name: Ability
results: +[[/roll d6 #damage]] vs targets without a shield

items.name: Ability
results: Can fetch items up to the weight of a coin

items.name: Side Effect
results: CLA Save or go blind for a moment
SPI Save or weep with intense sorrow

items.name: Punishment
results: Sea creatures get +[[/roll d6 #damage]] against you
River water tastes salty to you
